# Where have I been?


## Install
```{r install, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("leaflet",dep=T)
```

## Setup
```{r setup}
library(leaflet)
library(dplyr)
library(maps)

workdir="/Users/sunitj/GitHub/sandbox/Places"
setwd(workdir)
```

## States
```{r states}
mapStates = map("state", fill = TRUE, plot = FALSE)
leaflet(mapStates) %>%
    addTiles() %>%
    addPolygons(fillColor = topo.colors(10, alpha = NULL), stroke = F)
```
